item.title: Hooks vs. Classes in React
item.description: I’m working on building a simple expense tracking site, very creatively named Expense Tracker. I’m building it using React for the front-end and Node/Express for the back-end with data being stored in a PostgreSQL database. Here’s a work in progress screenshot: The main function of this site is to show you how much you’ve been spending in easy to read tables. I hadn’t needed to use tables with React before, so I started looking into it and found React Table.
